title: Combination immunotherapy could stop liver cancer growth

title_detail.value: Combination immunotherapy could stop liver cancer growth

summary: New preclinical data offers proof-of-principle for a combination immunotherapy that suppresses tumor growth in the liver. Current therapies for liver cancer are largely ineffective, resulting in poor outcomes.

summary_detail.value: New preclinical data offers proof-of-principle for a combination immunotherapy that suppresses tumor growth in the liver. Current therapies for liver cancer are largely ineffective, resulting in poor outcomes.
